entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Labrador City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 11:00 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: E 41 km/h gust 66 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
